item.title: Mentioned by CBC.ca
item.description:
MP defends decision to vote for Sable Island national park
Halifax MP Megan Leslie is defending her decision to vote in favour of the bill designating Sable Island, located off the coast of Nova Scotia, a national park. Bill S-15 passed through the House of Commons late Tuesday night after almost being quashed ...

item.title: Mentioned by Canada.com
item.description:
House of Commons has a 'locker room' mentality of casual sexism: NDP MP
NDP MP Megan Leslie rises during Question Period in the House of Commons on Parliament Hill in Ottawa, Thursday March 21, 2013 . ... Leslie is the Member of Parliament for Halifax and became one of the youngest deputy leaders in her party's history.
